messages.message: When you first go to My Hub it looks like something is broken as you need to choose an org. Can we add a placeholder to the blank element or can we auto select one of the orgs? Especially if there is only 1 org
I wonder if this is related to broken username? We should be auto-selecting an org. Ideally last used org. Adding in @Xindi Xu
I also just noticed I didn’t have a ‘My Workspace’. But I get it with a new account all with lowercase in the email
I have a PR that fixes this.

It’s related to not having a workspace for the user. Which I’m not really sure how this happens but it is the cause. We auto select the first workspace available, but when there isn’t one nothing gets selected
Yes, this is related to the recent username changes. Users shouldn't see this.
@Travis I don't think we need to fix this. I think this is only happening when the username is broken (which was due to mixed cases)
ah so this only occurs because of the case sensitive accounts. Got it
